settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure Binance API and trading parameters
settings.binanceNote: Binance API integration allows you to fetch real-time market data and execute live trades. You can test the connection without providing credentials to fetch public price data. For trading operations, you'll need to provide your Binance API key and secret.
settings.howTo: How to Get Binance API Credentials
settings.step1: Log in to your Binance account
settings.step2: Go to Account â†’ API Management
settings.step3: Create a new API key with appropriate permissions
settings.step4: Copy the API Key and Secret Key
settings.step5: Paste them in the fields above
settings.step6: For safety, enable "Restrict access to trusted IPs only"
settings.step7: Enable only "Enable Reading" for monitoring, or "Enable Spot & Margin Trading" for automated trading
settings.securityNote: Never share your API secret with anyone. Store it securely and only use it in trusted applications. Consider using the testnet/sandbox mode first to test the bot without risking real funds.
